title: For His Pleasure - Dr. Samuel C. Gipp
description:
This book is written to counter the noble misconception that soul winning, as great as it is, is the main theme of the Bible. God's main plan was not to create us so that we could become lost so that we could then win each other to Christ.

God had a far greater purpose in mind when He created man than just soul winning. It is the purpose of this book to enlighten readers to greater heights in their Christian walk. Read and learn your true purpose for existing. You were put here... For His Pleasure!


About the author:
Dr. Gipp is a former pastor, an evangelist, teacher, author and Bible conference speaker. He has the unique ability to digest large amounts of information and then present it in an analytical, understandable, format. His humerous, informative and forceful preaching style make him popular with all ages and keeps him in demand as a Revivalist and Bible conference speaker
